-1.title: Seattle
-1.plot: Jason Britton and his team invade the northwest with stunt riding shots at the Space Needle, Viaduct Skyline Shot, and Pike Place Market.

1.title: Detroit
1.plot: In the Motor City, Jason Britton and his team hit Heidelberg, Metro Station, the Packard factory, Zugg Island, Belle Isle, and Greektown.

2.title: Washington D.C.
2.plot: The No Limit Team heads to DC to practice their stealth stunting on some of the most closely guarded streets in the world.

3.title: Philadelphia
3.plot: Jason's team stunts the sights in Philly, including the Art Museum steps, South Street, Roosevelt Skate Park, Pat's Steakhouse and Gino's Steakhouse.

5.title: Los Angeles: Part 1
5.plot: Jason Britton and his team gather stunt riding shots of Venice Beach, Windward Cricle, Howard Hughes' hangers, and Stunt Road in Malibu.

6.title: Los Angeles: Part 2
6.plot: Jason Britton and his team gather stunt riding shots on Rodeo Drive in Beverly Hills, at the Disney Concert Hall and the Staples Center downtown.

7.title: Las Vegas
7.plot: Jason Britton and his team gather stunt riding shots at the Valley of Fire State Park, Hoover Dam, Fremont State Experience, and along Las Vegas Boulevard.

10.title: San Diego
10.plot: Jason Britton and his team gather stunt riding shots along the Nimitz Bridge, the Gas Light District and Ocean Beach Pier.

13.title: Baltimore
13.plot: Team No Limit revisits locations featured in the television series, "The Wire." Jason and his team perform stunts in Baltimore's stunning downtown and waterfront vistas.

imdb.plot outline: Jason Britton ignites his insatiable passion for riding by returning to his roots and shooting the ultimate stunt film. Jason and his team jump tour the country to "steal" the ultimate shots in front of the most iconic backdrops they can manage. Planned like a robbery, Jason and his team plan out the most minute details to capture stunt riding shots in unimaginable locations from the "Rocky" steps of Philadelphia to the French Quarter of New Orleans. The Stealth Rider premiere season will be one to remember. Only on SPEED.
imdb.title: Stealth Rider
plot: Jason Britton ignites his insatiable passion for riding by returning to his roots and shooting the ultimate stunt film. Jason and his team jump tour the country to "steal" the ultimate shots in front of the most iconic backdrops they can manage. Planned like a robbery, Jason and his team plan out the most minute details to capture stunt riding shots in unimaginable locations from the "Rocky" steps of Philadelphia to the French Quarter of New Orleans. The _Stealth Rider_ (qv) premiere season will be one to remember. Only on SPEED.
